Contact Us
Donations
Call Us, Email Us, or Send Us A Letter
Rapids Water Park
6566 North Military Trail, Riviera Beach, FL 33407
General Manager:
Bryan Megrath
General Information:
561-848-6272
Guest Relations:
561-848-6272 ext. 36
Email Address:
[email protected]
Park General Fax:
561-848-2822
Job Inquiries
Visit Job Opportunities
or visit the Rapids Water Park business office to pick up an application.
If you have questions about the park or need assistance with anything at all, we’re here to help. You can reach us by phone, email or regular mail.
Group Sales
Schools, Camps, Youth Groups, and Churches:
Eva: (561) 848-6272 Ext. 22,
[email protected]
Corporate, Special Events, Tour and Travel Groups:
Joyce: (561) 848-6272 Ext. 39
[email protected]
For any other group inquiries please call Rapids Group Sales at 561-848-6272
Group Sales is only in office Monday-Friday.
Corporate Office Contact Information
Premier Parks, LLC
209 Lilac Dr.
Suite 110
Edmond, OK 73034
Attention: Jeni Hooker
[email protected]
405-478-2522
SEND US A NOTE: Email
[email protected]
. Please allow up to one business week for a response.
Rapids Water Park is interested in hearing from you! We are committed to providing our guests with the finest in water recreation. Thank you for your interest in our park.
Concerned about your privacy? Please review our
Privacy Policy
.

Home

Special Events
2025 Special Events
Join us for these fun events in 2025!
Looking to bring a group to any of our special events?
Call
or
email
for special 15+ admission discounts!
Game Days
Saturdays & Sundays in the Fall:
Catch your favorite college and NFL games on the big screen at the Big Surf Wave pool every weekend. Games are subject to local broadcast availability.
The best way to get the full season of special events is with a Season Pass!
